name: Mindpeers
description: Mindpeers believe we’re crazy enough to change the world. Mental health was a stigma because we have never understood its science. Psychology, neuroscience, behavioral science - they tell you that all emotions are important, they reveal why we behave the we do. We’re not going to stop until every individual gives their mind the love and care it deserves, for being proud of taking care of their mental health. And if in this process, someone calls you crazy, we say be crazy because the crazy ones change the world

enhanced_description: Mindpeers is an evidence-based mental health platform designed to destigmatize mental health and promote individual and team well-being. Leveraging principles from psychology, neuroscience, and behavioral science, it provides therapy and offers tools to empower employees, elevate engagement, and cultivate resilience within organizations. The platform provides localized support with native therapists and coaches, delivers predictive mind-body insights, and offers engaging neuroscience tools like art therapy, games, and journals.
key_use_cases: Providing mental health support and therapy to employees
Facilitating employee development through mental health tools
Offering localized professional mental health support (therapists and coaches)
Providing insights into the correlation between employees' mental and physical health
Engaging employees with neuroscience-backed interactive tools (e.g., art tools, games, journals)
